headline: Cisco’s Outlook Reflects ‘Lingering Macro Uncertainty,’ Analyst Says
summary: Cisco Systems  stock was flat on Thursday as Wall Street digested slightly better than expected financial results from the networking company.  Cisco expects full-year adjusted earnings to be between $4 and $4.06 a share on revenue between $59 billion to $60 billion, compared with Wall Street estimates of earnings of $4.02 a share on revenue of $59.4 billion.  Shares of Cisco were up 0.1% to $70.50 on Thursday.

raw.headline: Cisco’s Outlook Reflects ‘Lingering Macro Uncertainty,’ Analyst Says

Cisco expects full-year adjusted earnings to be between $4 and $4.06 a share on revenue between $59 billion to $60 billion, compared with Wall Street estimates of earnings of $4.02 a share on revenue of $59.4 billion.  Shares of Cisco were up 0.1% to $70.50 on Thursday.

headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks We Think Twice About
summary: Mid-cap stocks often strike the right balance between having proven business models and market opportunities that can support $100 billion corporations. However, they face intense competition from scaled industry giants and can be disrupted by new innovative players vying for a slice of the pie.

raw.headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks We Think Twice About
raw.summary: Mid-cap stocks often strike the right balance between having proven business models and market opportunities that can support $100 billion corporations. However, they face intense competition from scaled industry giants and can be disrupted by new innovative players vying for a slice of the pie.
